title: *ENDED* -  ($6,000) Avail for SGC Green Cobb Portrait
author: GoBigRed

posts.post_title: *ENDED* -  ($6,000) Avail for SGC Green Cobb Portrait
posts.post_content:
ENDED

I am now looking for a T206 Geen Cobb in SGC.

I have a $6,000 budget for a Nice-for-Grade example.

Quick payment by Priority Mail, Tracking number for check provided same day as sale.

Preference is for the SGC New Label, but will take the older SGC Slab style, and reholder, for the right card.  May also consider PSA slab if value is right.

I rearranged my Flickr T206 Cobb Album Page to make the order of the Front/Rear card combos of my Cobb Run look better on the page.  

Just need to add a Green !

[URL="https://www.flickr.com/photos/knouse-albums/albums/72157714456674726"]https://www.flickr.com/photos/knouse-albums/albums/72157714456674726[/URL]

Please reply to my email:

arkansas2014@gmail.com

Steve
